portable-storage.exp_bottle.maintenance_: Level maintenance is enabled, manual XP access is blocked

portable-storage.fluid.water.title: Water
portable-storage.fluid.milk.title: Milk
portable-storage.fluid.desc: Fluid, cannot be taken out directly, use empty bucket right-click to take out
portable-storage.bed_placed: The temporary bed has been placed at your feet, lower your head and click on it to sleep!
portable-storage.bed.no_safe_place: No safe place to place bed!
portable-storage.bed.no_sleep_in_rift: You cannot sleep in place with the Bed upgrade inside the Rift!
portable-storage.ui.upgrade_desc.craftin: Crafting Table: Display warehouse in the container interface
portable-storage.ui.upgrade_desc.hopper: Hopper: Auto-pickup drops within 5 blocks into storage, middle-click to open filter configuration
portable-storage.ui.upgrade_desc.spectra: Spectral Arrow: Normal arrows apply 10s glowing
portable-storage.ui.upgrade_desc.bed: Bed (any bed): Right-click to sleep in place (no spawn point)
portable-storage.ui.upgrade_desc.experie: Experience Bottle: Store XP in storage
portable-storage.ui.upgrade_piston.auto_: Auto-refill: Automatically refill main hand and off-hand items from storage
portable-storage.ui.upgrade_piston.block: Block rotation: Hold piston and Shift+Left-click to rotate block orientation
portable-storage.ui.upgrade_desc.enchant: Enchanted Golden Apple: Auto-eat (automatically consumes the most abundant food from storage when hunger is below 14)
portable-storage.ui.upgrade_desc.trash_s: Trash Slot: Temporary storage, cleared on exit
portable-storage.ui.upgrade_desc.dragon_: Rift Upgrade: Right-click to enter private rift space
portable-storage.tooltip.enable_item_usa: Right-click to consume and enable storage
portable-storage.message.key_not_owner: This storage key does not belong to you!
portable-storage.message.storage_reactiv: Storage reactivated! Your items are safe.

portable-storage.message.key_unauthorize: You are not authorized to use this key!

Rebuilt new store index and cleaned templates with zero references
